OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive exatecan mesylate ( DX-8951f ) IV 30 minute day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 21 day least 2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 12-37 patient accrue study within 12 month .
